scene_description_enriched: A knight in golden armor and a blue tunic, wearing a blue hat with a feather, rides a white horse. The horse is adorned with a red and white patterned saddle cloth. The knight holds a lance, poised to strike a green dragon with wings and claws. The scene is set outdoors with a body of water and distant hills under a blue sky. The entire image is framed by an ornate, gilded border.
